K12D0419_H0379:379a-1: a'arya d'a ki n'i badzra panydza ra ma h'a tantra r'a dza kalpa n'a ma /

K12D0419_H0379:398b-24: sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab //
K12D0419_H0379:398b-25: spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //
K12D0419_H0379:398b-26: sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya //
K12D0419_H0379:398b-27: sems kyi rin chen rin po ches //
K12D0419_H0379:398b-28: bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par mdzad //
K12D0419_H0379:398b-29: sems kyi char sprin sbyor ba yis //
K12D0419_H0379:398b-30: yang ni bsdu ba bstan par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:398b-31: chos kyi rgyal po gti mug che //
K12D0419_H0379:398b-32: spro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs can de //
K12D0419_H0379:398b-33: thun tshod bzhir ni byin brlabs pa //
K12D0419_H0379:398b-35: sems ni 'gro mgyogs ltar bsams nas //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-1: rta mchog char sprin chen po yis //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-2: bsdu ba yang ni bsgom par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'i dam tshig chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-4: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-5: sems kyi rnam par bsgom par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-6: rnyog med dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-7: sku yi yi ge rnam par bsgom;/
K12D0419_H0379:399a-8: khrag gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-9: sems kyi rin chen yi ge dgod //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-10: ches kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-11: gsung gi yi ge rnam par bsgom //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-12: las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-13: de na yod yi ge gzugs can te //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-14: sku gsum mi byed sgom pa yis //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-15: ye shes rdo rje bsgom par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-17: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam snang la //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-18: rin chen sems kyi rin po che //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-20: shes rab ral gri don yod kyi //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-21: shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin gyi //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-22: rnam rtog ri bo bcad nas ni //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-23: phyag rgya chen po ldan par 'gyur //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-24: dpag tshad bye ba brgya par ni //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-25: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-26: phan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-27: rin chen phung po 'od chen dang //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-28: chos kyi phung po mgon chen dang //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje las //
K12D0419_H0379:399a-31: sangs rgyas sprin gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-0: nam mkha' @399b khams kyi dbus gnas par //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-1: ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-2: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis gang //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-3: thams cad du ni sna tshogs gzugs //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-4: mchod ba kun gyis mchod par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-5: mtshams kyi lha mo'i sbyor ba yis //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-6: ye shes rgya mtsho rab bsgrub bya //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-7: dam tshig 'khor lo bcug pa yi //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-8: ye shes rdo rje chen po 'bar //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-9: sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pas //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-10: skad ceg la ni gnyis med 'gyur //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-11: ru raksha dang dung bse ru //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-13: mu tig la sogs byi ru sogs //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-14: bsam gtan ldan pa sngags bzlas bya //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-15: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-16: mkha' 'gro ma dang rang btsun mo //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-17: mngon sum du ni bya ba'i phyir //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-18: sngags ni snyan gsan 'bebs par brjod //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-19: dper na skyes chen la la zhig /
K12D0419_H0379:399b-20: skad cig nga ros bos pa na //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-21: thos pa tsam gyis 'ongs gyur pa //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-22: de ltar skad cig sangs rgyas gshegs //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-23: 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-24: na mkha'i khams kyi mkha' grong du //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-25: phyag rgya chen po'i bde gnas kyi //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-26: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-27: de rnams sngags rig drung ni gshegs //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-28: rdo rje spyan gyis rnam par gzigs //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-29: gang gis sngags kyi rim thob pa //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-30: ae ma de yis byang chub thob; ;sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-31: sngags kyi spyod pa dang por 'dzin //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-32: rdo rje sngags ni rab sbyor bas //
K12D0419_H0379:399b-33: mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes 'thob //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-2: sngags kyi spyod pa'i rim gnas pa //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-3: 'bras bu nyid la ni gzigs te //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-4: de ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa brjod //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-5: sangs rgyas nga rgyal dmigs nas ni; ;chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal ba //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-6: gang zhig sgom pa de bas na //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-7: sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-8: 'jig rten ji ltar sangs rgyas te //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-9: ji ltar chos kyang dge 'dun te //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-10: sems can khams ni de ltar bshad //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-11: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-12: dan par brtags pa'i rnam rtog gis //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-13: rin chen sems ni dri can byas //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-14: sems dag pas ni dag par 'gyur ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'jig pa //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-15: nam mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin sems //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-16: sems kyi rin chen bskul ba las //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-17: sems nyid sgom pa sangs rgyas te //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-18: skye bar sangs rgyas dam pa nyid //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-19: rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-20: sangs rgyas med cing gang zag med //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-21: rnam par shes pa'i gnas don nam //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-22: phyi rol gyur ba cung zad med //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-23: yid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-24: khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-25: 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po che //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-26: sems gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-27: gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-28: ro dang reg bya'i rang bzhin te //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-29: chos kyi dbyings ni mchog tu zhi //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-30: 'di ni rin chen mchog tu brjod //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-31: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
K12D0419_H0379:400a-32: 'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-0: 'di @400b dag thams cad sems las skyes /
K12D0419_H0379:400b-2: yid bzhin nor bu rin po che //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-4: sems kyi de nyid rang bzhin dag /
K12D0419_H0379:400b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ster //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-6: de nyid phyir na sangs rgyas kyis //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-7: sems gyi rdo rje bskul pa yis //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-8: zab mo'i rnam pa des ldan pa'i //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-9: phyed par dga' ba'i dngos grub ster //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po snang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12D0419_H0379:400b-11: de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha'
K12D0419_H0379:400b-12: 'gro ma'i gur bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge
K12D0419_H0379:400b-13: 'dzin la bzhugs te bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs
K12D0419_H0379:400b-14: pa / sangs rgyas gnas ni rab rdzogs dang //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-15: rnam pa lnga po bsgoms pa dang //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-16: kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin dang //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-17: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sgrub dang //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-18: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-19: mchod bstod bdud rtsil sogs pa //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-20: rim pas rjes su bsgom par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-22: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka badzra sva bh'a ba a'atam konyham/
K12D0419_H0379:400b-23: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a mri t'a sv'a da badzra sva bh'a ba a'atam ko nyham/
K12D0419_H0379:400b-25: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0419_H0379:400b-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta stu ti badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atam konyham/
K12D0419_H0379:400b-27: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to //

K12D0419_H0379:401a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rta mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to /
K12D0419_H0379:401a-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na

K12D0419_H0379:401a-5: rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pas de skad
K12D0419_H0379:401a-7: spro ba dang ni bsdus pa'i sku //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-8: rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad che //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-9: chos dbyings yi ge las skyes pa //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-10: des ni sangs rgyas gnas dgod bya //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa n'i la ya badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'a tma konyaham/
K12D0419_H0379:401a-12: rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-13: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-15: de yi steng du sangs rgyas bsam //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-16: spros nas gzhal yas gnas dgod bya //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-17: rdo rje lta bu mi phyed phyir //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-18: des na mi bskyod bsgom par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-19: ma skyes rjes su dran pa las /
K12D0419_H0379:401a-20: rnam par snang mdzad phan pa nyid //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-21: rin chen rnams kyi mchog gi mchog /
K12D0419_H0379:401a-22: 'di ni rin chen sems su bshad //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-23: rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug pa'i //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-26: sems ni 'dod chags zhes byar bshad /
K12D0419_H0379:401a-28: de phyir don yod rab tu grags //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-29: rig ma mdzes ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-30: bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-31: gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-32: gsum pa shes rab ye shes te //
K12D0419_H0379:401a-33: ji ltar lus ni de bzhin gshegs //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-0: @401b dkyil 'khor dam ba bris nas ni //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-1: dam tshig khu ba'i cho ga yis //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-2: ham dang bsam gtan bskyed byas nas //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-3: de tshe dbugs byung sbyin par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-4: mkha' 'gro lnga dang ldan pa dang //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-5: dam tshig lnga yis bkang ba dang //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-6: mkha' 'gro ma yis tshogs ldan pas //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-7: rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor bas //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-8: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar byas la //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-9: slob ma rtag par nges bsams te //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-10: rgyun gyis rigs kyi ming gis ni /
K12D0419_H0379:401b-11: slob ma rdo rje can dbang bskur //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-12: spyan dang bde bdag mo sgrol ma dang /
K12D0419_H0379:401b-13: dkar mo la sogs bdag gzugs kyis //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-14: rdo rje btsun mo rab sbyor bas //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-15: rdo rje bla med bshad par bya //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-16: bla na med pa'i de nyid 'di //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-17: gnyis su med cing yi ge med //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-18: chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal byed //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-19: bde ba bzang po'i ro myang ge //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-20: sgrib pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-21: ga dang ha zhes bya ba dang; ;dang po mthar yang shva ldan pa'i //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-22: rab tu gsal ba dam pa nyid //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-23: dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-24: tshogs kyi rdo rje bdud rtsi myang //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-25: 'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-26: sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-27: rdo rje dang ni mnyam par 'gyur //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-28: nad rnams thams cad rab tu zhi //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-29: de ni gzi brjid lus chen po //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-31: phas kyi rgol ba kun las rgyal; ;'jig rten kun gyi bdag pos brgyan //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-32: lha rnams kyi ni 'dren par brjod //
K12D0419_H0379:401b-34: chos kyi bras ni zab bo //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-1: gtan zos pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-2: mi bskyod brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-3: nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-4: rtag par chu shel chen por ldan; ;rdo rje nyi ma rgas pa med //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-5: don yod rgyal po chen po ni //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-6: rdo rje srog gi yan lag 'byung //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-7: don kun sgrub cing dpal dang ldan /
K12D0419_H0379:402a-8: des ni rnal 'byor par ni brjod /
K12D0419_H0379:402a-9: mi bskyod btung ba'i sbyor ba las //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-11: phan pa'i sa ni khri ru brjod //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-12: rdo rje nyi mas rdo rje'i 'bum //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-13: tshe dpag med kyis dpag med dang //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-14: bdun gyis nam mkha' ji srid bshad //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-15: rdo rje nyi ma dpag med dag //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-16: 'khor ba'i sgrub thabs rtsa ba nyid //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-19: shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-20: 'di ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-21: chos rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-23: sangs rgyas rdo rje can nyid kyi //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-24: thabs dang shes rab zhon pa dag /
K12D0419_H0379:402a-25: khams gsum dag ni thams cad du //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-26: sa dang sa 'og bar snang la //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-27: khrag dang khu bas khyab pa'i lus //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-28: rigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'di gsungs //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-29: sen mo ba spu de bzhin khams //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-30: khu ba la ni rnam par gzigs //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-31: pags dang khrag la gzi brjid che //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-32: tshil dang rkang la rdo rje 'dzin //
K12D0419_H0379:402a-33: thams cad mgon po rnam snang mdzad //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-0: rtsa dang sha @402b la bdun rgyal po //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-1: 'di rnams la ni sangs rgyas lngar //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-2: rdo rje mkha' 'gros rnam par bshad //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-3: sa yi bmas ni rnam dag pa //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-4: spyan ni 'khor lo mdzes pa nyid //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-5: rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-6: padma'i bu mo tsha ba nyid //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-7: sgrol ma rlung ni rnam par dag //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-8: rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-10: gur gyis de rnams bka' stsal to //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-11: sngags thams cad rnam par dag pa bdud rtsi lnga
K12D0419_H0379:402b-12: mchog tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
K12D0419_H0379:402b-14: khyod ni zhe sdang rdo rje yongs skyong ba //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-15: thugs dang chos ni shin tu rnam dag pas //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-16: lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-17: pu ba s'i ni bdag la myur du gzigs //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-18: rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten don gyi phyir //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-19: stong ba nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-20: khyod ni gti mug rdo rje yongs skyong ba; ;sku yi bdag po chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyis //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-21: lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-22: mgon po ri khrod ma la myur du gzigs //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-23: rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du //
K12D0419_H0379:402b-24: stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod //
